BodyCopy.p: Artex Risk Solutions will open a Singapore office, its first in the region, to oversee the growth and development of the organization's Asia Pacific captive insurance and risk solutions strategy. Vic Pannuzzo will head the effort as chief executive for the new office.

"Over the past few years, Artex has … broadened [its] reach into Europe and significantly increased scale in Bermuda and the Cayman Islands," said Artex President and CEO David McManus. "We have a number of clients in the Asia Pacific region already."
